example.parse: (IP-TPC (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VP (NP-TMP (NT 以前)) (VP (VV 以为) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VC 是) (NP-PRD (ADJP (JJ 小)) (NP (NN 虫))))))) (PU ，) (VP (NP-TMP (NT 现在)) (ADVP (AD 却)) (VP (VV 觉得) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 好像)) (VP (VE 有) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (QP (CD 一) (CLP (ADJP (JJ 大)) (CLP (M 群)))) (NP (NN 酷斯拉))) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 正)) (ADVP (AD 在)) (ADVP (AD 暗中)) (VP (VV 潜伏))) (PU 、) (VP (VV 伺机而出)))))))))))
